## set environment

```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

# Set rendering parameters
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)



```

## vector indexing

```{r vector indexing}

w = c(11,12,13,14,15)
w[1]
w[3]
w[2:5]
w[c(T,T,F,T,F)]

w[-2]
w[2]


```
## inserting new values into a vector
```{r vector insertion}

length(w)
mode(w)
w = c(w[1], F, w[2:length(w)])
mode(w)

y = c('a', 'b', 'c')
y = c(1, y)


```

## adding to the start or end of a vector
```{r start and end}

w = c(w, 1)



```

## recycling to populate a vector
```{r recycling}
x = c(1,2,3)
y = c(4,5,6,7)

x + y

x = vector('numeric', 10)
x[1:10] = c(1,2)


```
## using the colon operator
```{r colons}

5:11
11:5
n=10

5:n-1

5:(n-1)


```
## some other useful ways to make vectors
```{r generate vecs}
seq(from = 1, to = 10, by = 2)
seq(1, 10, .2)
seq(1, 10)

rep(c(1,12), 3)

# 3 6 9 3 6 9 3 6 9 3 6 9

rep(c(3,6,9), 4)


```
